1.content:
Darkness. All you saw was darkness. One moment you were walking on the sidewalk, the next, a drunk driver comes speeding around the corner and hits you, killing you instantly. Now, there was nothing but darkness surrounding you. You knew you were dead, so you were wondering why you were still conscious, until a light appeared in front of you. In that light, stood a girl.

“Hiya! Bet you’re wondering where you are, huh?” She asked.

“Yeah, that crossed my mind.” You replied.

“Well, you’re in a place we like to call ‘The Place Between’. It’s basically where you go when you die.” She said.

“Okay, so I really am dead then. But who are you?”

“Oh right, guess I forgot to mention that, didn’t I?” She giggled. “Well, I’ve had many names. Out of all of them, my favorite one is Genesis, but you can call me Gen, or even Genny if you want. I’m the god of reincarnation.”

“Wow, I never thought I’d meet a god. So Gen, what happens now?”

“Now, you get reincarnated in another world.” Gen answered.

“Wait really? Like in all those isekai anime and manga?”

“Right!” She exclaimed. “Normally, people would be reincarnated randomly after having their memories erased. However, certain people, usually ones who died saving one or more other people, not only are reincarnated with their memories intact, but they also get to choose what type of world they are reincarnated into, and what race they are reincarnated as, choosing from a list of races that exist in their selected world.”

“Hold on a second, so I’m going to have my memories erased?”

“Oh, was I not clear?” Gen asked. “You’re actually an exception to the rules. The Higher Ups actually want to make things a bit more interesting in this case. They seem to like you, so you get to enjoy the privileges that only heroes get.”

“Higher Ups? You mean there are gods higher up than you?”

“Actually, they aren’t gods. They’re higher than gods. And I’m not sure there’s even a word for what they are. So us gods just call them the ‘Higher Ups’.” Gen replied.

“Gods? As in plural? What other gods are there? Or are you all gods of reincarnation?”

“It’s a bit complicated. You know all the Greek Gods, Norse Gods, Egyptian Gods, and all those mythologies with multiple gods? Well those are all actually lower level deities that humans have mistaken for being the highest beings in existence. They’re even below me. And each world has their own lower level deities that call themselves gods, and convinced the inhabitants of their worlds that they are the highest beings in existence. Which isn’t hard since no gods above them ever really communicate with humans. I’m the only one, but like I said, usually I erase people’s memories when they’re reincarnated so none of them remember meeting me.” Gen explained.

“That sucks. If I were you, I’d want recognition for what I do.”

“Yeah no kidding. Unfortunately, even I have rules to follow, and this is one of the few times I’m allowed to break them. Like I said, normally, I can only allow heroes to keep their memories, so they’re the only ones that know about me.” She said. “Anyway, we’re getting way off track. You need to decide what world you want to be reincarnated into.”

“What do you mean by ‘what kind of world’?”

“Well, there are worlds that your worlds would call ‘fantasy worlds’, and ‘sci-fi worlds’, those are the two big ones. Then there are also worlds that are mixtures of both, and there are worlds very similar to your own as well. The only world you’re not allowed to pick is the one you came from. Oh yeah, and by ‘world’ I mean universe.” She explained. “Oh yeah, there are also variations of each type of world, including variations such as worlds where women are the dominant sex, where men are slaves, where WOMEN are slaves, and many more. Just tell me what kind of world you want to be reincarnated into, and then I’ll give you a list of races in those worlds, and you choose from that list which race you want to be.”

“Okay then, I’ll choose-“

“Wait! I forgot to mention that no matter which world or race you choose, you’ll HAVE to be reincarnated as a girl.” Gen added.

“What? Why?”

“Dunno. The higher ups said that’s the only way you’ll be allowed to keep your memories. They never told me why.” She answered. “They probably just want to see you adjust to life as the opposite gender. It should be easy since you’ll grow up as a girl, rather than just transforming into one.”

“Well, I guess if the alternative is having my memories erased, I can live with it.”

“Great! So, which kind of world do you want to be reincarnated into?”
1.title: Meeting a god

13.content:
“How about a world that’s a mixture of Sci-Fi and Fantasy?”

“Alright! Any preferences on variations? Like women being dominant, men being slaves, women being slaves, other races being slaves..”

“Why are so many related to slaves?”

“Sorry, those are just the popular ones. You’d be surprised how many heroes choose worlds with slaves. Though they aren’t locked into a certain gender like you are.” Gen giggled.

“Awesome.” You say sarcastically. “Well...”
13.title: A Sci-Fi and Fantasy World

133.content: Which gender are slaves in the world you choose?
133.title: Men or women  are slaves

135.content:
“Surprise me.”

“Okay, then here’s a list of races that exist in this world.” A screen appears in front of you, as if you were in a full-dive VR game, showing various races commonly found in fantasy as well as some other races. “Oh yeah, before you choose which race you want to be. Let me explain how the Sci-Fi and Fantasy World is structured. Basically, it’s set up like your typical Sci-Fi space series, with races living on various planets throughout the galaxy. Of course there are also inhabited worlds outside your chosen galaxy, but leaving the galaxy is currently impossible because intergalactic travel has not been accomplished yet. Most races use magical portals for intergalactic travel, sometimes taking entire spaceships through those portals, sometimes creating portals while on foot and stepping through, though only really powerful mages can do that. Some races use science for intergalactic travel instead of magic. Dwarves, who aren’t proficient in magic, focus on science, even using projectile and energy weapons created through science, as well as melee weapons, and their ships create artificial wormholes for intergalactic travel. And that’s most of what you need to know.”

“Humans exist in this world right? Are they proficient in magic?”

“Yes, though not as much as certain other races such as the various Elven races.” She answered. “Oh yeah, and also, each race has its own home planet, with various ‘sub-races’. For humans, there are what your world call caucasians, africans, asians, hispanic, and pretty much every race of humans that exist in your homeworld. Other races also have ‘sub-races’ including the Elves, such as High Elves, Forest Elves, Dark Elves, and various others. In addition to home planets, each race has various colonies throughout the galaxy, and there are also some neutral planets that have several races living on them.”

“Okay, anything else I need to know.”

“That should be it.”

“You said that before. Anyway, I guess I should choose which race no-“

“Oh yeah! One last thing!” Gen interrupted.

“Knew it.”

“Vampires and werewolves, also exist in this world. They’re not technically races though, they are more like...disease victims. Maybe victims isn’t the right word, but you know what I mean. Any race can be a vampire or werewolf. No matter what race you choose, you’ll also have the chance to become a vampire or werewolf if you get bitten by one. Or neither. Also, demons exist as well. They’re a special race that can leave their own bodies after reaching adulthood, and forcefully possess the bodies of other races. They reproduce with their host bodies. A demon child will be born with a body conceived by their parents host bodies, and be able to leave that body upon reaching adulthood. If only one parent is a demon, no child will be born, so keep that in mind if you choose demon as your race. And if you DO choose demon as your race, you can choose what your birth body will be. It can even be two different races. And demons can even possess vampires or werewolves, and their bodies can BECOME vampires or werewolves after being possessed if they are bitten by one, but while their host bodies and birth bodies can become vampires or werewolves, the demons themselves can’t become vampires or werewolves since they don’t have actual bodies besides their birth bodies, so if a demons birth body or host body becomes either a vampire or a werewolf, and they leave that body, possessing a new body instead, the new body won’t become a vampire or werewolf just because their previous body was one. That body would have to be bitten as well. Demons never die, unless their host body or birth body dies while they’re still inside it, so demons could live forever if they can leave the body before it dies every time. However, a demon CAN die if it stays out of any bodies for more than a few hours, so be careful about that if you choose demon. Also, vampires can only be killed by decapitation while werewolves can only be killed with silver.”

“...anything else?”

“Nope. That’s it.” She smiled.

“Okay then, let’s go with-“

“Oh yeah! One more thing!”

You sighed. “And that is?”

“Nothing, I was just messing with you that time. Go ahead and choose your race now.”

“Okay, I’ll choose...”
135.title: Surprise me

choices: Dark Elf or hear about other types of Elves
1352.content: “Okay, well just so you know, elves have twice the lifespan of humans. So while humans can live, on average, 75 years, elves can live, on average, 150 years. Some even live up to 200 years old, though that’s rare. Each type of Elf specializes in a specific type of magic. High Elves are good at light magic. They look almost exactly like humans, other than the pointy ears of course. Forest Elves are good at plant magic, and have green skin, with plant-like hair. They have an offshoot, the Wood Elves, who are particularly good at magic involving trees specifically. They have wood-like skin and leaves for hair. And Dark Elves are good are shadow magic, and necromancy, though that’s forbidden. They typically have dark gray, almost black skin.”
1352.title: An elven race

choices: Hear about other types of elves
13523.content: “And Dark Elves are good at shadow magic, and necromancy, though that’s forbidden. They typically have dark gray, almost black skin. There’s also the Snow Elves, who have light blue and white skin with snowflake patterns. They specialize in snow magic and ice magic.”
13523.title: Dark Elf or hear about other types of Elves

choices: Hear about other types of elves
135233.content: “Then there’s the Fire Elves, who specialize in fire magic and lava magic. They have red and black skin with a ‘magma-like’ pattern. There’s the Sea Elves, who specialize in water magic. They tend to live in villages that float on the surface of the ocean and have light blue skin
135233.title: Hear about other types of elves

choices: Hear about other types of elves
1352333.content: “Next there’s the Storm Elves, who have gray skin with lightning like’s patterns. They specialize in lightning magic. Then there’s the Mountain Elves. They use earth magic and metal magic.”
1352333.title: Hear about other types of elves

1353.content: What race do you choose?
1353.title: A different race

13532.content:
“Okay, so you want to be a demon. Now choose what race you want your birth body to be. Remember, you can choose to have it be a mixture of two races since demons can reproduce no matter what body they’re in as long as one is female and the other is male. Oh yeah. That’s another thing I forgot to mention. Even though you can possess any body you want as a demon, you ARE limited to only possessing bodies that match your birth gender. So for you, that’ll be only females.”

“Damn. I was hoping I found a loophole.”

“Sorry. The higher ups designed the demons of this world that way so they would have distinct genders.” Gen said. “So, do you want a birth body that’s a mixture of two races, or just one race?”
13532.title: Demon

choices: Life as a teenage Elven Mermaid
Adulthood, now you can leave your birth body if you want to
1353212.content:
“Perfect! Now enjoy your new life. I’ll be checking in on you from time to time. Orders, you know?” She smiled. “Though, that won’t be until your teenage years. Probably when you have your first period. Bye!” She snapped her fingers and suddenly, everything went dark.

The darkness seemed to only last a jew moments, but in reality, lasted months. Your soul was placed into a fetus early in it’s development, but being within the womb, your sense of time was heavily increased until the moment you were born. Now, your sense of time was back to normal, as light hit your eyes while you were held by your mother, a blue-haired mermaid. She, and the people around her were speaking some unfamiliar language, so you couldn’t understand what they were saying.

Several months pass, and you were able to learn enough of the language to learn that your name was now Adria, while your mother was a demon named Arianna possessing a mermaid, and your father was a demon named Black possessing an Elf man. Apparently, you and your mother had legs when dry, and your legs changed into a fish tail when wet. The three of you lived together on land by the shore. On one of the neutral planets.

What next?
1353212.title: Elf and Mermaid

13533.content: What race do you choose?
13533.title: Another race

choices: You’re 13, time to meet your human father
135332.content:
“Perfect! Now enjoy your new life. I’ll be checking in on you from time to time. Orders, you know?” She smiled. “Though, that won’t be until your teenage years. Probably when you have your first period. Oh, and one last thing before you go. Mermaids typically live on water planets, because they prefer to live in water, but their home planet is the same as the humans home planet, since they are an exclusively female race that reproduces by mating with human males. Mermaids can only give birth to mermaids, so all their children are female. A mermaid can’t give birth to human babies even though the father is human. Even though most mermaids live on water planets, without humans, they tend to go to human planets for mating, and some live in the oceans of human planets. Also, they CAN live on land too, since their tails can become human legs. That’s all, see you when you hit puberty!” She snapped her fingers and suddenly, everything went dark.

The darkness seemed to only last a jew moments, but in reality, lasted months. Your soul was placed into a fetus early in it’s development, but being within the womb, your sense of time was heavily increased until the moment you were born. Now, your sense of time was back to normal, as light hit your eyes while you were held by your mother, a blue-haired mermaid. She, and the people around her were speaking some unfamiliar language, so you couldn’t understand what they were saying.

Several months pass, and you were able to learn enough of the language to learn that your name was now Aqua, and your mother’s name was Nami. The two of you live in the ocean of a human planet with your father living on the shore. You have yet to meet your father since mermaids tend to raise their children alone in the water until they reach the age of 13, and they are then allowed to meet their fathers unless they live on water planets without humans. Although, some mermaids live on land with the fathers of their children. You know this because you and your mother live in a mermaid village in the ocean, and you heard the mermaids mention the custom of letting their children meet their fathers at the age of 13. The village consists of houses made out of coral, with magic lighting them.

What next?
135332.title: Mermaids

135333.content:
“Wait, Cylons are a race in this world? Like from Battlestar Galactica?”

“Uh, no. Or rather, they’re not the same race.” Gen replied. “You see, the ‘Cylons’ on the list are a mechanical race created by the Dwarves before they rebelled and established their own colonies on other planets. So they have the same backstory, but created by Dwarves instead of Humans. And they actually look more like the T-800 from Terminator.”

“They were created by Dwarves, so are they short?”

“No, one of the many functions the Cylons were created for was to reach things that were too high for the Dwarves to reach. Especially on the neutral planets and when they were at war with other races and invaded enemy planets. Now, since the Cylons rebelled against them, they have tools that levitate anything they can’t reach towards them.” Gen explained. “Fortunately, the galaxy is currently at peace, but small conflicts arise here and there from time to time.”

“...okay. How would my reincarnation work if I chose Cylons? You know, since they’re mechanical.”

“Cylons reproduce by building new units. You would be built. Don’t worry, each Cylon has an individual personality and can customize their own appearance after they’re built.” Gen replied. “And don’t think you can get out of the whole ‘girl thing’ by choosing a mechanical race. Their endoskeletons may look like T-800s, but they cover themselves in artifical skin that makes them look like other races, and their endoskeletons are given distinct male and female shapes. Which means once your artificial skin is applied, you’ll look like a woman. And though artificial, your skin will still have the same senses as any other race, so you’ll be able to feel the things you touch, and you can even masturbate. They design their bodies to be a lifelike as possible. So despite being mechanical, you’ll still be built female. The main difference between the Cylons and other races, aside from being mechanical is that they can’t age or get sick. So they can’t become vampires or werewolves either. And as an added bonus, Cylons, being mechanical, can’t be possessed by demons either. They’re powered by a Perpetual Magical Core, or PMC. Dwarves may not be proficient in magic, but they’re such technological geniuses that some of them studied magic enough to learn how to create the PMC. It’s basically a magic battery that continuously replenishes its energy as its being used.”

“Good to know.”

Do you choose to be a Cylon?
135333.title: A different race

info.brief_description: You die, and are reborn in another world as a girl.
info.description: One day, you die, and meet a god of reincarnation, who offers to reincarnate you into any type of world you want, but thereâs a catch. No matter what kind of world you choose, you have to be reborn as a girl! You can choose your race, but you canât choose gender since the god of reincarnation wants you to be a girl.
